get.summary:
Lists the effective permissions for the user in the account identified by the given ID.
Required permissions:
- read:roles

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description:
The identifier of the account (in GUID format).
This is a required field.

get.summary:
Lists all permissions known in the system for the provided account.
Note: If you want to get a list of permissions available for you, please use GetEffectivePermissions instead.
Required permissions:
- read:roles

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description:
The identifier of the account (in GUID format).
This is a required field.

get.summary:
Lists all roles in the account identified by the given ID.
Required permissions:
- read:roles

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description:
The identifier of the account (in GUID format).
This is a required field.

get.summary:
Gets a role for the account identified by the given ID.
Required permissions:
- read:roles

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description:
The identifier of the account (in GUID format).
This is a required field.

parameters.name: roleId
parameters.description:
The identifier of the role (in GUID format).
This is a required field.

delete.summary:
Deletes a role in the account identified by the given ID.
Note: The role_type must be ROLE_TYPE_CUSTOM.
Required permissions:
- delete:roles

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description:
The identifier of the account (in GUID format).
This is a required field.

parameters.name: roleId
parameters.description:
The identifier of the role (in GUID format).
This is a required field.

get.summary:
List roles of the user identified by the given ID.
Required permissions:
- read:roles

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description:
The identifier of the account (in GUID format).
This is a required field.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description:
The identifier of the user (in GUID format).
This user should be part of the provided account.
This is a required field.

post.summary:
Assigns the provided roles to the user in the account identified by the given ID.
Required permissions:
- write:roles

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description:
The identifier of the account (in GUID format).
This is a required field.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description:
The identifier of the user (in GUID format).
This user should be part of the provided account.
This is a required field.

post.summary:
Creates a role for the account identified by the given ID.
Note: The role_type must be ROLE_TYPE_CUSTOM.
Required permissions:
- write:roles

parameters.name: role.accountId
parameters.description:
The identifier of the account (in GUID format).
This is a required field.

put.summary:
Updates a role in the account identified by the given ID.
Note: The role_type must be ROLE_TYPE_CUSTOM.
Required permissions:
- write:roles

parameters.name: role.accountId
parameters.description:
The identifier of the account (in GUID format).
This is a required field.

parameters.name: role.id
parameters.description:
Unique identifier for the role (in GUID format).
This is a read-only field and will be available after a role is created.

get.summary:
Gets the authenticated user.
Required permissions:
- None (authenticated only)

Gets the authenticated user's consent status for a specific legal document.
Required permissions:
- None (authenticated only)

parameters.name: documentType
parameters.description:
The type of the legal document.
This is a required field and cannot be UNSPECIFIED.

 - LEGAL_DOCUMENT_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: Unspecified document type.
 - LEGAL_DOCUMENT_TYPE_TERMS_OF_SERVICE: Terms of Service document.
 - LEGAL_DOCUMENT_TYPE_PRIVACY_POLICY: Privacy Policy document.
 - LEGAL_DOCUMENT_TYPE_SLA: Service Level Agreement document.

post.summary:
Records the authenticated user's consent for a legal document.
Required permissions:
- write:user

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: RecordUserConsentRequest is the request for the RecordUserConsent function.

get.summary:
Lists all quotas for the authenticated user.
Required permissions:
- None (authenticated only)

put.summary:
Updates the user identified by the given ID.
Required permissions:
- write:user

parameters.name: user.id
parameters.description:
Unique identifier for the user (in GUID format).
This is a read-only field and will be available after the user is created.

roleIdsToAdd.description:
The roles to add to the provided user.
If a role was already part of the user or the same role is provided multiple times, the role will be added exactly one time.

roleIdsToDelete.description:
The roles to be deleted from the provided user.
If a role is part of the role_ids_to_add this field takes precedence.

IAMServiceAssignUserRolesBody.title: AssignUserRolesRequest is the request for the AssignUserRoles function

id.description:
Unique identifier for the role (in GUID format).
This is a read-only field and will be available after a role is created.

createdAt.description:
The timestamp when the role was created.
This is a read-only field and will be available after a role is created.

lastModifiedAt.description:
The timestamp when the role was last updated.
This is a read-only field and will be available after a role is created.

name.title:
The name of the role.
Name can only contain letters, numbers, underscores and dashes

description.description: The human readable description of this role.

permissions.description:
The permissions associated with this role.
Must contain at least one permission.

The name of the role.
Name can only contain letters, numbers, underscores and dashes

description.description: The human readable description of this role.

permissions.description:
The permissions associated with this role.
Must contain at least one permission.

IAMServiceUpdateRoleBody.description: UpdateRoleRequest is the request for the UpdateRole function.

The timestamp when the user was created.
This is a read-only field and will be available after the user is created.

lastModifiedAt.description:
The timestamp when the user was last updated.

v1GetUserConsentResponse.description: GetUserConsentResponse is the response from the GetUserConsent function.

v1LegalDocumentType.description:
LegalDocumentType specifies the type of a legal document.

 - LEGAL_DOCUMENT_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: Unspecified document type.
 - LEGAL_DOCUMENT_TYPE_TERMS_OF_SERVICE: Terms of Service document.
 - LEGAL_DOCUMENT_TYPE_PRIVACY_POLICY: Privacy Policy document.
 - LEGAL_DOCUMENT_TYPE_SLA: Service Level Agreement document.

v1ListAuthenticatedUserQuotasResponse.title: ListAuthenticatedUserQuotasResponse is the response from the ListAuthenticatedUserQuotas function

v1ListEffectivePermissionsResponse.title: ListEffectivePermissionsResponse is the response from the ListEffectivePermissions function

permissions.description: The permissions know by the system.

items.description: The actual roles in this list.

v1ListRolesResponse.title: ListRolesResponse is the response from the ListRoles function

roles.description:
The roles assigned to the user.
If the user has no roles, this list will be empty.

v1ListUserRolesResponse.title: ListUserRolesResponse is the response from the ListUserRoles function

documentType.description:
The type of the legal document.
This is a required field and cannot be UNSPECIFIED.

statusUpdate.description:
The status update initiated by the user.
This is a required field and cannot be UNSPECIFIED or PENDING.

v1RecordUserConsentRequest.description: RecordUserConsentRequest is the request for the RecordUserConsent function.

id.description:
Unique identifier for the role (in GUID format).
This is a read-only field and will be available after a role is created.

createdAt.description:
The timestamp when the role was created.
This is a read-only field and will be available after a role is created.

lastModifiedAt.description:
The timestamp when the role was last updated.
This is a read-only field and will be available after a role is created.

accountId.description:
The identifier of the account (in GUID format).
This is a required field.

name.title:
The name of the role.
Name can only contain letters, numbers, underscores and dashes

description.description: The human readable description of this role.

permissions.description:
The permissions associated with this role.
Must contain at least one permission.

v1Role.description: A Role represents a role in the Qdrant cloud.

v1RoleType.description:
- ROLE_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: The role type is unspecified.
 - ROLE_TYPE_SYSTEM: The role type is system.
Note: system roles cannot be changed (create/update/delete).
 - ROLE_TYPE_CUSTOM: The role type is custom defined.
v1RoleType.title: RoleType specified the type of the role

v1UpdateRoleResponse.description: UpdateRoleResponse is the response from the UpdateRole function.

v1UpdateUserResponse.description: UpdateUserResponse is the response from the UpdateUser function.

id.description:
Unique identifier for the user (in GUID format).
This is a read-only field and will be available after the user is created.

createdAt.description:
The timestamp when the user was created.
This is a read-only field and will be available after the user is created.

lastModifiedAt.description:
The timestamp when the user was last updated.
This is a read-only field and will be available after the user is created.

email.description:
The email address of the user.
This is a read-only field.

status.description:
The status of the user.
This is a read-only field.

defaultAccountId.description:
The default account ID of the user (in GUID format).
You should be member of the account when updating.

v1User.description: A User represents a user in the Qdrant cloud.

documentType.description: The type of the legal document for which consent status is reported.

status.description:
The latest consent status recorded from the user for this document type.
Will be USER_CONSENT_STATUS_UNSPECIFIED if no status update has been recorded.

lastModifiedAt.description:
Timestamp of the most recent status update.
Unset if no status update has been recorded.

isAccepted.description:
A convenience field indicating if the current status is an acceptance.
True if status is USER_CONSENT_STATUS_ACCEPTED, false otherwise.

v1UserConsent.description: User Consent represents the consent status of a user for a specific legal document.

v1UserConsentStatus.description:
UserConsentStatus specifies the status from an user for a consent.

 - USER_CONSENT_STATUS_UNSPECIFIED: Unspecified consent status.
 - USER_CONSENT_STATUS_ACCEPTED: The user accepted the consent.
 - USER_CONSENT_STATUS_REVOKED: The user revoked the consent.
 - USER_CONSENT_STATUS_PENDING: The consent is pending action from the user.
Pending consent means that the user got notified about the new version of the document. After a certain
period of time, we auto accept pending consents depending on the document type.

type.description:
The type of the quota.
This is a read-only field.

v1UserQuota.description: An UserQuota represents a quota for an authenticated user.

v1UserQuotaType.description:
UserQuotaType defines the possible quota types of a user.

 - USER_QUOTA_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: Default, unspecified status.
 - USER_QUOTA_TYPE_MAX_OWNED_ACCOUNTS: The maximum number of allowed accounts owned by a user.

v1UserStatus.description:
UserStatus defines the possible statuses of a user.

 - USER_STATUS_UNSPECIFIED: Default, unspecified status.
 - USER_STATUS_ACTIVE: The user account is active and can be used.
 - USER_STATUS_BLOCKED: The user account is blocked and cannot be used.
 - USER_STATUS_DELETED: The user account has been marked for deletion or is deleted.
